chapters.title: Chapter 22: The Wyld
chapters.info: Bao the Wyld, p. 405—Alleged savior of the Sharan people. He bears a striking resemblance to Demandred: dark hair, light skin, a hooked nose, and very handsome in general. He wears armor made of all coins, silvery and overlapping, polished to a mirror-like luster. His Sharan accent is not as thick as the others' accents, likely because his is an imitation. The legend of Bao the Wyld is likely the Sharan equivalent of the Prophecies of the Dragon, or at least an interpretation of their role in them. Editor's note: we are led to assume that it was Demandred's theft of Bao the Wyld's persona that caused the Dark One to laugh when Demandred asked him whether he had done well. See also Coramoor; Demandred; Dragon, The; Dragon Reborn; He Who Is Owned Only by the Land.
